advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Join The Hunt, and you’ll never again wonder where someone got that amazing outfit. 

Post a pic of what you’re looking for, and the community of over 3 million savvy shoppers will help you find it, style it, or buy it for less. Cute winter boots? Check. Covet worthy heels? Yep. Cozy sweaters?  The community can find those, too. 

As a member of the community, you can return the favor and help others with your own style expertise. Trade fashion tips, get advice, and discover new places to shop. 

The Hunt is perfect for all your fashion needs (including the ones you didn’t know you had yet!).  Awarded “Best of Digi” 2013 by InStyle!

Features:
- Start a Hunt: post a photo of anything, no matter the style, and find out where to buy it from the fashion forward community
- Solve a Hunt: use your shopping skills to recommend products to others
- Browse: see what’s on trend right now. 
- Shop around: find that look for less with the community’s advice 

Featured on:
- Refinery29 
- The Zoe Report
- US Weekly
- People Style Watch
- Betches Love This

What people are saying: 
“I love to shop online, but I have a tendency to over do it. The Hunt allows me to indulge my love of shopping by helping others without having to break the bank!” - @gabriellac
“The Hunt helps me to discover so many amazing fashion stores and blogs just by searching to help others! It’s really helped to evolve my personal style and wardrobe!” - @heyimkat
releaseNotes:
New in v2.5.3:

+ Makeover! The Hunt has a new look -- a crisp white header and a totally new feed that highlights the Finds added to a Hunt and the Hunt type. We hope you like it!
+ In-app alerts -- instant alerts when something happens that you won’t want to miss, like when a Find is added to your Hunt or your Find is deemed *Perfect*.
+ Psst…You can now hide a Hunt from your Profile.
+ Improvements to make images load even faster.
+ Glitch fixes.

v2.5:

+ Search by username -- If you don't know someone's full username, we'll help narrow your search.
+ Refinds -- With over 4.5M items found, wouldn’t it be great if The Hunt told you when our community's already tracked down the thing you're hunting for? Now when you start a hunt, you could be notified of potential Refinds!
